content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, it's my pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. So, let's discuss the rental price. What would you consider a fair price for this modern, city-center apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would say 500 Euro per month seems fair. Considering the location and size of the apartment, it's a reasonable price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 500 Euro per month is much lower than what I'm looking for. This apartment is brand new and in a prime location. I'm seeking a price that reflects its quality and convenience. How about 750 Euro per month? Do you think that would be more in line with the value of the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a high price. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment and the city's average rent prices, I don't think 750 Euro per month is reasonable. I would say 600 Euro per month is more in line with the market price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your perspective, but 600 Euro per month is still below my expectations. The apartment's location and amenities justify a higher price. Let's meet in the middle. How about 650 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise, don't you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's better, but I still think 600 Euro per month is the highest I would be willing to pay for an unfurnished apartment in Duisburg, considering the average market price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your stance, but as the landlord, I have to ensure that the rent reflects the investment I've made in this property. 650 Euro per month is the lowest I can go. It's a premium apartment in a premium location. If you're not willing to meet at this price, I'm afraid we might have to look for other options.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Haoyu. However, I stand by my offer of 600 Euro per month. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have reached an impasse regarding the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. It seems we have different opinions on the value of the apartment. I wish you the best in finding a tenant who appreciates the apartment's location and amenities at the price you're seeking. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
